member.name: T:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation
member.summary: Specifies the direction of an image's rotation and the axis used to flip the image.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate180FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.RotateNoneFlipNone
member.summary: Specifies no rotation and no flipping.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate270FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate90FlipNone
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation without flipping.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate180FlipNone
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation without flipping.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.RotateNoneFlipXY
member.summary: Specifies no rotation, a horizontal flip, and then a vertical flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate270FlipNone
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation without flipping.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate90FlipXY
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip and then a vertical flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate180FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.RotateNoneFlipX
member.summary: Specifies no rotation and a horizontal flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate270FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate90FlipX
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate180FlipX
member.summary: Specifies a 180-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.RotateNoneFlipY
member.summary: Specifies no rotation and a vertical flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate270FlipX
member.summary: Specifies a 270-degree rotation followed by a horizontal flip.

member.name: F:ByteScout.TextRecognition.AreaRotation.Rotate90FlipY
member.summary: Specifies a 90-degree rotation followed by a vertical flip.

member.name: T:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer
member.summary: Represents base class for text recognizers.

member.name: E:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.PasswordRequired
member.summary: Occurs when the password required to open PDF document.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name part of the registration information.
member.value: The name part of the registration information.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.RegistrationKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the key number part of registration information.
member.value: The key number part of registration information.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.PDFRenderingResolution
member.summary: Gets or sets PDF rendering resolution. Default is 300 DPI.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.PDFRenderingOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets PDF rendering options.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.OCRLanguage
member.summary:
Language for Optical Character Recognition (OCR). The valid values are: ValueLanguage
"eng"English (default)
"deu"German
"fra"French
"spa"Spanish
...See more languages at https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tessdata/tree/3.04.00

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.OCRLanguageDataFolder
member.summary: Folder containing OCR language data files. The folder can be located anywhere by must be strongly named "tessdata".
member.remarks: By default the component expects "tessdata" in the folder containing the executing assembly.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.IsDocumentLoaded
member.summary: Gets whether a document is loaded.

member.summary: Gets version of the component.

member.summary: Releases managed resources of the component.

member.summary: Releases loaded document and allocated resources.

member.summary: Loads document from file.

member.summary: Loads document from byte array.

member.summary: Loads document from Win32 HBITMAP structure.

member.summary: Loads document from object.

member.summary: Loads document from stream.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.GetPageCount
member.summary: Returns number of pages in loaded document.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.GetPageSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns document page dimensions in pixels.
member.remarks: Pixel size of PDF document page is calculated from document point size (1/72") and value.
member.returns: Dimensions of the document page in pixels.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.GetPageWidth(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns document page width in pixels.
member.remarks: Pixel size of PDF document page is calculated from document point size (1/72") and value.
member.returns: Width of the document page in pixels.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.BaseRecognizer.GetPageHeight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns document page height in pixels.
member.remarks: Pixel size of PDF document page is calculated from document point size (1/72") and value.
member.returns: Height of the document page in pixels.

member.summary: Adds deskew image processing filter with default angle threshold 0.4 deg (minimal admissible skew angle).

member.summary: Adds deskew image processing filter with specified angle threshold (minimal admissible skew angle).

member.summary: Adds dilate image processing filter.

member.summary: Adds vertical lines remover filter.

member.summary: Adds median image processing filter.

member.summary: Adds median filter with specified block size.

member.summary: Adds gamma correction filter with default value 1.4.

member.summary: Adds gamma correction filter.

member.summary: Adds contrast image processing filter.
member.param: Contrast value from -100 to 100. Default is 0 (no contrast adjustment).

member.summary: Gets or sets the vector smoothing mode.

member.summary: Gets or sets the image interpolation mode.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render text objects. True by default.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.PDFRenderingOptions.RenderVectorObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render vector objects. True by default.
member.value: True if render vector objects; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.PDFRenderingOptions.RenderImageObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render image objects. True by default.
member.value: True if render image objects; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.PDFRenderingOptions.RenderCurveVectorObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to render curve vector objects. True by default.
member.remarks: Use RenderCurveVectorObjects if you need to hide curves but keep straight lines. Use if you need to hide all vector drawings. property supersedes RenderCurveVectorObjects.

member.name: T:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer
member.summary: Represents text recognizer that able to extract text from scanned PDF files and PNG, JPEG, BMP and TIFF (single-page) images using Optical Character Recognition (OCR).

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.ComHelpers
member.summary: Set of helping methods for use from COM/ActiveX.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.PageSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets the page separator character or string. Default is "\r\n".

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.RecognitionAreas
member.summary: Collection of page areas intended for text recognition.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.Corrections
member.summary: Collection of corrections automatically applied to recognized text to fix repeating recognition errors.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.ImagePreprocessingFilters
member.summary: Collection of image preprocessing filters.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.AutoDetectPageRotation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TextRecognizer will try to automatically detect the rotation of a scanned page. Default is false.

member.name: P:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.KeepTextFormatting
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to try to keep the text formatting.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.GetOCRObjects(System.Int32,ByteScout.TextRecognition.OCRObjectType)
member.summary: Performs the recognition and returns list of recognized text objects of specified level of discretization.
member.param: Objects type to return (level of discretization). Default is .
member.returns: List of recognized objects of specified discretization level.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.GetText(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads text from specifed document page range.
member.param: End page index (zero based). -1 means all pages to the end.
member.returns: Concatenated text from range of pages. Pages are separated with symbol.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.SaveText(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Saves text from specified page range to file.
member.param: End page index. -1 means all pages to the end.
The character encoding to use. UTF-8 encoding is used by default.
member.remarks: Text from different pages is separated with symbol.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizer.SaveText(System.IO.Stream,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Saves text from specified page range to .
member.param: End page index. -1 means all pages to the end.
The character encoding to use. UTF-8 encoding is used by default.

member.summary: Represents errors that occur during the text recognition process.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ByteScout.TextRecognition.TextRecognizerException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
